BLIST.ITEM:
Display the npm version npm --version
npm -v
Create a package.json file npm init
Return the npm global path npm root -g npm root --global

BLIST.TITLE: -save options
BLIST.ITEM:
Install <package-name> as a development dependency, it will be recorded in the devDependencies section of package.json npm install --save-dev <package-name>
npm install -D <package-name>
Install <package-name> as a deployment dependency, it will be recorded in the dependencies section of package.json npm install --save <package-name>
Install <package-name> without updating package.json npm install <package-name> alias npm i <package-name>

BLIST.TITLE: Uninstall a package
BLIST.ITEM: Remove a package from local node_modules folder and from projectâ€™s package.json npm uninstall <package-name>
Remove a global package npm uninstall -g <package-name>

BLIST.TITLE: Security audit
BLIST.ITEM: Run an audit and automatically install any compatible updates to vulnerable dependencies npm audit fix

BLIST.TITLE: Cache
BLIST.ITEM: Set the cache directory npm config set cache "H:\Documents\tools\Node\npm-cache" --global
Check the cache npm cache verify
Clean the cache (this should not be necessary, so --force is required, otherwise npm will refuse do do it) npm cache clean --force

BLIST.TITLE: Proxy
BLIST.ITEM:
Set the proxy npm config set proxy 10.99.0.211:3128
npm config set https-proxy 10.99.0.211:3128

Unset the proxy npm config rm proxy
npm config rm https-proxy
